scripts.devbuild: npm run getDevQoiViewer && npm run buildDevQoiViewer
scripts.getQoiViewer: rm -rf projects/qoi-viewer-src && git clone https://github.com/lukeflima/qoi-viewer projects/qoi-viewer-src
scripts.getDevQoiViewer: rm -rf projects/qoi-viewer-src && git clone https://github.com/lukeflima/qoi-viewer projects/qoi-viewer-src
scripts.prebuildQoiViewer: npm run getQoiViewer && source $HOME/.cargo/env && cargo install wasm-pack
scripts.buildQoiViewer: cd projects/qoi-viewer-src && source $HOME/.cargo/env && wasm-pack build && mkdir ../qoi-viewer/ && cp pkg/* ../qoi-viewer && cd .. && rm -rf qoi-viewer-src
scripts.buildDevQoiViewer: cd projects/qoi-viewer-src && source $HOME/.cargo/env && wasm-pack build && mkdir ../qoi-viewer/ && cp pkg/* ../qoi-viewer
scripts.buildAndInstallQoiViewer: npm run buildQoiViewer && npm run installQoiViewer
